survey_name: Customer Satisfaction with Autonomous Delivery Robots Survey
survey_brief: This survey aims to evaluate customer satisfaction and experiences with autonomous delivery robot services in urban areas.

questions.question_text: How often have you used autonomous delivery robot services in the past 3 months?
questions.client_notes: Use a single-choice radio button for clear response capture.

script.question_text: How often have you used autonomous delivery robot services in the past 3 months?

questions.question_text: What is your primary reason for using autonomous delivery robot services?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered '1-2 times', '3-5 times', or 'More than 5 times' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Include an 'Other' option with a text field for additional inputs.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: radio button with optional text input (SINGLE_CHOICE with 'Other' triggering open text)

script.question_text: What is your primary reason for using autonomous delivery robot services?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered '1-2 times', '3-5 times', or 'More than 5 times' to Q1

questions.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of autonomous delivery robot services?
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered '1-2 times', '3-5 times', or 'More than 5 times' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Use a 5-point Likert scale for consistency in satisfaction measurement.

script.question_text: How satisfied are you with the reliability of autonomous delivery robot services?
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered '1-2 times', '3-5 times', or 'More than 5 times' to Q1

questions.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for autonomous delivery robot services?
questions.client_notes: Open-ended question to capture qualitative feedback.

script.question_text: What improvements would you suggest for autonomous delivery robot services?

questions.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in autonomous delivery robots? (Select up to 2)
questions.routing_logic: Respondents who answered '1-2 times', '3-5 times', or 'More than 5 times' to Q1
questions.client_notes: Multi-choice question to understand priority features.
questions.scripter_notes: Field type: checkbox (MULTI_CHOICE with max 2 selections)

script.question_text: Which of the following features do you value most in autonomous delivery robots? (Select up to 2)
script.routing_logic: Respondents who answered '1-2 times', '3-5 times', or 'More than 5 times' to Q1
